question_text: If a switch port is assigned to VLAN 20, what happens to broadcasts sent from that port?
answer_options: They are only received by devices in VLAN 20
They are received by all VLANs on the switch
They are dropped by the switch
They are forwarded to the router
correct_answer: They are only received by devices in VLAN 20
explanation: Each VLAN is a separate broadcast domain; broadcasts stay within that VLAN.
